ygData.subject: Zone size on the Moon? RoK big or SoL size?
ygData.msgSnippet: Your note gets me wondering something, has anyone seen or heard what the zone sizes will be for SoL? I remember how bad I hated the new zones when RoK came
ygData.messageBody:
Your note gets me wondering something, has anyone seen or heard what the
zone sizes will be for SoL? I remember how bad I hated the new zones when
RoK came out. Oh so big, but then with SoV they seemed to scale them smaller
than RoK, but larger than the first ever zones in Everquest. I sure hope the
Moon has about the same size zones as Great Divide, I think that is about
the perfect size zone. So has anyone heard?

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [SMTP:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 07, 2001 12:30 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: EK at 16 (was:RE: [eqbards] JM Capozi)

At 01:26 PM 11/7/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>I was going solo at that level in EK. I was doing the
hymn-cod-bellow
>twist. At the time I was in bronze and banded, far from what level
16
>equipment is these days. So more times then not I would have to
stop that
>twist and kite them with selo and bellow.
>
>If I had it to do over again these days (now that there is Kunark
and
>Velious) I would probably go to Lake of Ill Omen.

My major problem with Lake of Ill Manners is distance from bind
point. It's so far to run to a zone, or if I die, from the zone to
where I
died, I'd be really bad off....

Talies
